verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H7851>Shittim<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, he and all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there before they passed <S%H5674>over<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H7097>after<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, that the <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%>;

And they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When ye <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> it, then ye shall <S%H5265>remove<s%> from your <S%H4725>place<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it.

Yet there shall be a <S%H7350>space<s%> between you and it, about two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> by <S%H4060>measure<s%>: come not <S%H7126>near<s%> unto it, that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> by which ye must <S%H3212>go<s%>: for ye have not <S%H5674>passed<s%> this <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8543%H8032>heretofore<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves: for to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>. And they took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, This <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H1431>magnify<s%> thee in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that, as I was with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so I will be with thee.

And thou shalt <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When ye are <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>brink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, ye shall stand <S%H5975>still<s%> in <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Come <S%H5066>hither<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Hereby ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and that he will without <S%H3423>fail<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, and the <S%H1622>Girgashites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>.
Behold, the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%> passeth <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.
Now therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, out of <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, as soon as the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>, shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that come <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%>; and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H5067>heap<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from their <S%H168>tents<s%>, to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>;

And as they that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H2881>dipped<s%> in the <S%H7097>brim<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%>, (for <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4390>overfloweth<s%> all his <S%H1415>banks<s%> all the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>,)

That the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up<s%> upon <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H5067>heap<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H121>Adam<s%>, that is <S%H6654>beside<s%> <S%H6891>Zaretan<s%>: and those that came <S%H3381>down<s%> toward the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%>, even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H8552>failed<s%>, and were cut <S%H3772>off<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> right against <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and all the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> on dry <S%H2724>ground<s%>, until all the <S%H1471>people<s%> were <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8552>clean<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.
